etymology.description: semantic: 戈(戈) (gē, "halberd") + phonetic: 魁(魁) (kuí, "leader") = representation of a type of halberd -> specific term for a kind of weapon
etymology.interpretation: The character 戣 (kuí) combines the semantic element 戈(戈) (gē, "halberd"), which signifies a type of weapon, with the phonetic element 魁(魁) (kuí, "leader"), to denote a specific type of halberd. This illustrates the character's function in ancient times to describe a particular weapon used in warfare.
